availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William O. Bradley (Somerset, Pulaski County, resident)

body.p: Somerset, Pulaski County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Robert M. Bradley and Nancy Ellen Totten Bradley. Resident in Somerset, Pulaski County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, Somerset, p. 152. Kleber eds., The Kentucky Encyclopedia (Lexington, KY: The University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 112, (accessed via Google books).
